privacy-policy.initial-text: We are committed to protecting your privacy and safeguarding your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose information when you use our products and services.
privacy-policy.info-we-collect-value: We collect personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number when you sign up for our services or make a purchase on our website. We may also collect non-personal information such as your device type, IP address, and browsing behavior.
privacy-policy.sharing-your-info-value: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with our trusted partners who provide services on our behalf, such as payment processing or shipping. We may also share your information when required by law or to protect our rights and property.
privacy-policy.how-we-use-info-value: We use your personal information to provide you with our products and services, to communicate with you about promotions and offers, and to improve our website and services. We may also use your information for analytics and marketing purposes.
privacy-policy.security-value: We take security of your information seriously and use industry-standard measures to protect it from anauthorized access or disclosure.

terms-of-use.initial-text: These Terms and Conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our products and services. By using our website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these Terms and Conditions, please do not use our website or services.
terms-of-use.use-of-service-value: Our services are intended for personal, non-commercial use only. You may not use our website or services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using our website and services.
terms-of-use.intellectual-value: All content on our website, including text, images, and logos, is the property of [Brand Name] and is protected by copyright laws. You may not use any content from our website without our prior written consent.
terms-of-use.limitation-value: We are not responsible for any damages or losses resulting from your use of our website or services. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
terms-of-use.Changes-to-these-terms-value: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Country]. Any disputes arising from these terms will be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts of [Country].

NO_RESULTS: Could not find the story you were looking for?
ABOUT_US_TEXT:
Our vision is a world where every child gets a fair start in life.

Our mission is to enable every child to experience the early interactions and strong relationships that will set them up for life.

We believe technology can play a positive role in early learning. That's why our team of experts in child development, research, and medicine created TANDEM. Our cutting-edge platform uses generative AI, passive sensing, and interactive content to transform screen time into personalised, playful reading and learning experiences. TANDEM is designed to foster early childhood development, spark curiosity, and strengthen the bond between you and your child.

You can learn more about who we are and why we’re building TANDEM at www.playtandem.com

If you’re interested in working with us, please get in touch at hello@playtandem.com

FAQ_QA.A1: TANDEM is an app that allows you and your child to generate and read stories together, and to share them with others. It’s AI powered and draws on cutting-edge developmental science, designed to help your child to thrive, and to help to build early relationships.
FAQ_QA.Q2: What age of children is TANDEM designed for?
FAQ_QA.A2: Tandem has been designed with children aged from 2-5 years in mind, but we think that those older and younger will love it too. The app adapts to different reading ages and developmental stages to try to make sure that it’s always pitched at the right level.
FAQ_QA.Q3: How does TANDEM keep my, and my child’s, data private and safe?
FAQ_QA.A3: Keeping your data secure, and being clear about what data we collect, are really important to us. We follow strict data protection standards which includes… [KEV to add here?]. You can read more about our approach to data protection here: [link to privacy policy]
FAQ_QA.Q4: What data do you collect, and why?
FAQ_QA.A4: TANDEM, like most apps, collects data on your interactions with the app. We also collect data from your child’s interactions with the app. These include things like how often you use Tandem, how long you spend doing different tasks like creating stories and reading together, and how many stories you create. We are also planning to use audio and eventually video data from your time reading together to track things like your child’s reading level, and the ‘serve and return’ back-forth turn taking in your reading together. Before we introduce this feature we’ll ask for your explicit permission though.
FAQ_QA.Q5: Can I track my child's progress and activities through TANDEM?
FAQ_QA.A5: Not yet, but we’re working on this. We’re planning to build in both a survey that you can complete to track your child’s development, and - eventually - automated tracking of your child’s development. When we introduce these we’ll tell you more about them if you choose to opt into them.
FAQ_QA.A6: You can think of it a bit like a set of AI powered story dice. When your child uses TANDEM they create stories by choosing from a set of characters, ideas, things and types of stories, and these are fed into our story engine, which then uses one of several AI large language models to create a story that we then check and improve on. Eventually, we’ll also allow these stories to link to each other, allowing the AI to make engaging, fun and interesting stories that both you and your child want to read. We’re also working on adding in sound effects too.
FAQ_QA.Q7: Is the content in TANDEM educational?
FAQ_QA.A7: Yes, but we’re more interested in you and your child having fun together. There is a wealth of evidence that shared attention and interaction in the early years are the ‘magic ingredient’ for good child development. So although the content we create will help to promote early learning and literacy, we’re really trying to help to support relationships through you having fun reading and laughing together. You can learn more about early interaction here.
FAQ_QA.Q8: What AI is in the ‘backend’ of the app?
FAQ_QA.A8: We’re currently testing a few different AI engines to power TANDEM, including those from OpenAI (GPT4 and DALLE 3) and those from Anthropic (Pi). Eventually, we will run our own servers, but for now our ‘Reasoning engine - Velo’ - the brains behind TANDEM, which checks all the content and helps to make sure it’s good quality - works with external APIs. You can read more about Velo here [link to blog-tbc].
FAQ_QA.Q9: Do I have to pay to use TANDEM?
FAQ_QA.A9: No, at least not at the moment. For now, while we’re building and testing, everything is free. You can use TANDEM as much as you want. However, because every story creation costs money because of the computing power needed to make and to check it, eventually we will need to build a subscription model. But we’re very keen that those who don’t have many books at home are able to have access to TANDEM, so we’re looking at a number of business models to allow this.
FAQ_QA.Q10: How can I leave and delete all my information?
FAQ_QA.A10: We hope you don’t want to leave, but you can find the option to delete your account, and all the information we hold in it, in the settings page of the app.
FAQ_QA.Q11: What are the technical requirements for using TANDEM?
FAQ_QA.A11: Tandem is compatible with most modern smartphones and tablets. Check the app’s download page in the app store for specific operating system requirements.
FAQ_QA.Q12: What AI is in the backend of the app?
FAQ_QA.A12: Tandem is powered by OpenAIs GPT-4o , gpt-3.5-turbo, and dall-e 3.

ROBOT_TEXT_CONFETTI: Your ideas have been sent to the robots. They’re making them into a story! It might take a minute or two…

STORY_PROGRESS_ALERT: While you wait for the story to be built, why don't you...
FLIP_CARD_TEXT:
Flip over two cards at a time to find pairs.
Find all pairs to win the game!
MICROPHONE_PERMISSION_TEXT: You need microphone permission to play the game.
MICROPHONE_ENABLE_TEXT: You can enable microphone permission from the settings or you can rotate the windmill by swiping the blades with your finger.
GENERATED_ENOUGH_ENERGY: Yay! You have generated enough energy!
STORY_AVAILABLE_TEXT: Your Story will be available soon
BLOW_WIND_PHONE: Blow wind into your phone's Microphone to rotate the windmill
GENERATE_ENOUGH_ENERGY_TEXT: Generate enough energy to create your story book
ROTATE_WITH_FINGERS_TEXT: You can also use you fingers to rotate the blades of the windmill
REVIEW_BOOK_BEFORE_READING_TO_CHILD: Your book is ready - please flick through the book and make sure you are happy with it before reading with your child.
BLOW_SWIPE_WINDMILL: You can either blow or swipe on the windmill to generate power for the story engine
POWER_GENERATION: Great work! You have generated enough energy to power the story engine!
STORY_AVAILABLE_SOON: Your story will be available soon.
BLOW_WIND_MICROPHONE: Make some wind to spin the wind turbine! Blow into your phone’s microphone.
FIGURE_SPIN_BLADE: You can also use your fingers to spin the blades of the wind turbine.
ENOUGH_POWER_TEXT: We’ll let you know when you’ve generated enough power!
TANDOM_ROBOT_STORY: Your ideas are on their way to the TANDEM story robots, who are turning them into a brand new story.
Activate_Engine: But first… you’ll need to power up the story engine!
AI_INSTRUCTIONS: This story was made with AI. Before reading it with your child, please quickly look at the pictures to check them. If you find an image that isn’t right for a children’s book, click on the three dots at the top of the page to flag it. Then, you can go back and make a new story with different pictures.
SHAKE_TEXT: You can tap the button or shake the device at any time to shuffle the deck again
SHAKE_DEVICE: Tap the button or Shake the device to play again
RECORDING_SAVE_TEXT: Are You Sure  you want to save recording
RECORDING_TEXT_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to start recording?
